definition: to chase after/to seek/to do one's utmost to seek or procure sth/to recall
after all/to investigate/to study carefully/Taiwan pr. [jiu4]

sentences.english: Those whose act constitutes a crime shall be prosecuted for their criminal liability.
sentences.chinese: 對構成犯罪的，依法追究其刑事責任。

sentences.english: All acts in violation of the Constitution or the law must be investigated.
sentences.chinese: 一切違反憲法和法律的行爲，必須予以追究。

sentences.english: If a crime is constituted, he shall be transferred to the department of justice and subject to criminal liabilities.
sentences.chinese: 構成犯罪的，依法移交司法機關追究其刑事責任。

sentences.english: If the case is serious enough to constitute a crime, criminal responsibility shall be affixed.
sentences.chinese: 構成犯罪的，依法追究刑事責任。

sentences.english: He made a mistake, but I let it pass.
sentences.chinese: 他犯了一個錯誤，但我未予追究。

sentences.english: On the contrary, the process of practice and misjudgments system for investigating abuses continued to arise.
sentences.chinese: 相反，在實踐過程中，錯案追究制的弊端卻不斷出現。

sentences.english: He is subject to criminal liabilities according to law.
sentences.chinese: 被依法追究刑事責任的。

sentences.english: Eric understands that regardless of whose fault it was, he should not make any further investigation.
sentences.chinese: 孫耀威當明白不論口臭王是誰也不宜追究。

sentences.english: We will establish a system of legal accountability and punishment in which powers, responsibilities and interests are in close correspondence.
sentences.chinese: 建立權責利相對應的法律追究懲治體系。

sentences.english: If tampers with the manuscript to originate arbitrarily, this net will hold responsible legally.
sentences.chinese: 如擅自篡改稿件來源，本網將依法追究責任。

sentences.english: If a crime is constituted, the person in charge shall be investigated for criminal responsibilities according to law.
sentences.chinese: 構成犯罪的，對責任人員依法追究刑事責任。

sentences.english: Have the ideal the women with pursued all Be value esteeming.
sentences.chinese: 有理想有追究的女子都是值得尊重的。

sentences.english: It will establish the feedback and correction systems and the responsibility tracing system for decision making.
sentences.chinese: 建立決策反饋糾偏機制和責任追究制度。

sentences.english: If the case is serious enough to constitute a crime, criminal responsibilities shall be affixed.
sentences.chinese: 構成犯罪的，依法追究刑事責任。

sentences.english: Moreover, the Event promoter reserves the right to pursue relevant legal responsibilities.
sentences.chinese: 賽事主辦推廣方保留進一步追究其法律責任的權利。

sentences.english: I don't know anymore what you really think of me…
sentences.chinese: 就有如我姐或弟向我要錢我也從來不會深入追究用途。

definition: to try to find out/to trace/to track down
to show an interest in/to get involved with
to conceal/to hide (a taboo subject)/to cover up the truth
to discipline sb/to punish/disciplinary action/to deal with (a matter)/CL:個|个[ge4]
